section.name: Installing the Gallery Picker Plugin
section.p: This section assumes you are using Maven to manage your Hippo CMS project.

subsection.name: Archetype generated projects higher than version 7.7
subsection.p: Projects generated using the Hippo Project Archetype have the Gallery Picker Plugin included by default. If you used the archetype to kick-start your project, you are all set.

subsection.name: Hippo CMS 7.6 (2.20.xx)
subsection.p: Add the following dependency to your custom CMS project's pom.xml file:
Rebuild your project to include the plugin.
Hippo CMS 7.6 already defines the correct repository and version for this plugin in its master POM, so you don't have to include these in your POM.
